opening:
Hi, my name is Elliot. You're special and I want to test you. I want you in my group.
If you manage to think logically and solve this game with its puzzles, you'll be our new member.
You$re in a small room. There are a door with a note on it, a book shelf, a desk with a computer and a carpet

books.name: passwords
books.content: I$ll better set my password 1234 to never forget it

books.name: banana
books.content: Bananas are tasty. Monkeys love them! [You've found the Easter Egg]

books.name: safe
books.content: The book was hollowed out and inside it was a key!
